title: AU Deals: Pay the Least Gil for FF7 Rebirth on PC, FC 25, Star Wars Outlaws, Spidey, and More!
description: Get into the middle of a landslide of discounts during the absolute middle of your week!
author: Adam Mathew
byline: The Best Gaming Deals In Australia
excerpt: Get into the middle of a landslide of discounts during the absolute middle of your week!
text: Cloud gaming at its finest for less.It's a glorious hump day of hot discounts galore. Cases in points: great prices for Bravely Default II, Tekken 8, and Miles Morales Ultimate. I also have a lot of time for The Surge going for a mere 3 bucks on Xbox. Pretty great sci-fi Soulslike, so absolutely sacrifice the price of a coffee for a play of it. In retro news, it's been 16 years since we (repeatedly and hilariously) flung ourselves down hills and into the Hall of Meat in Skate 2. This second entry in the series was a pretty phenomenal upgrade over the OG and cemented the franchise as a proper threat to the Tony Hawk's Pro Skater empire. Needless to say, I'm still jonesing mighty hard for the 'Skate 4' spiritual successor/F2P reimagining.Happy Bday Skate 2 This Day in Gaming ðŸŽ‚Aussie birthdays for notable games.- Zelda: Link's Awakening DX (GB) 1999. eBay- Skate 2 (PS3,X360) 2009. eBay- Trauma Center: New Blood (Wii) 2009. eBayTable of ContentsNintendo SwitchPCXboxPlayStationLEGONice Savings for Nintendo SwitchBravely Default IIBravely Default 2 is a long, familiar journey with excellent customizable combat and jobs systems that let you make your party and your playthrough truly your own. 8/10, great.Yooka-Laylee (-80%) - html:
Cloud gaming at its finest for less.

It's a glorious hump day of hot discounts galore. Cases in points: great prices for Bravely Default II, Tekken 8, and Miles Morales Ultimate. I also have a lot of time for The Surge going for a mere 3 bucks on Xbox. Pretty great sci-fi Soulslike, so absolutely sacrifice the price of a coffee for a play of it.

In retro news, it's been 16 years since we (repeatedly and hilariously) flung ourselves down hills and into the Hall of Meat in Skate 2. This second entry in the series was a pretty phenomenal upgrade over the OG and cemented the franchise as a proper threat to the Tony Hawk's Pro Skater empire. Needless to say, I'm still jonesing mighty hard for the 'Skate 4' spiritual successor/F2P reimagining.

Happy Bday Skate 2

This Day in Gaming ðŸŽ‚

Aussie birthdays for notable games.

- Zelda: Link's Awakening DX (GB) 1999. eBay

- Skate 2 (PS3,X360) 2009. eBay

- Trauma Center: New Blood (Wii) 2009. eBay

Nice Savings for Nintendo Switch

Bravely Default II

Bravely Default 2 is a long, familiar journey with excellent customizable combat and jobs systems that let you make your party and your playthrough truly your own. 8/10, great.
